title: Felidae
summary: Felidae (/ˈfɛlɪdiː/) is a family of mammals in the order Carnivora, colloquially referred to as cats, and constitutes a clade. A member of this family is also called a felid (/ˈfiːlɪd/).[4][5][6][7] The term "cat" refers both to felids in general and specifically to the domestic cat (Felis catus).[8]
